resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157291</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157291</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1048</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Travel Brochure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spielraum-Broschüre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Brochure de Voyage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folheto Do Curso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Opuscolo Di Corsa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φυλλάδιο ταξιδιού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Folleto Del Recorrido</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this activity learners will prepare a travel brochure about a country or city they would like to visit. They may use information found on the Internet or other sources such as CD ROMs, encyclopedias, atlases, travel agencies, etc.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">travel brochure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">country</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">city</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Aktivität bereiten Anfänger eine 
Spielraumbroschüre über ein Land oder eine Stadt vor, die sie 
besichtigen möchten. Sie können die Informationen verwenden, 
die auf dem Internet oder anderen Quellen wie CD ROMAS, 
Enzyklopädien, Atlassen, Reisebüros, usw. gefunden werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette activité les étudiants prépareront 
une brochure de voyage concernant un pays ou une ville qu'ils 
voudraient visiter. Ils peuvent utiliser l'information trouvée 
sur l'Internet ou d'autres sources telles que des ROM de CD, des 
encyclopédies, des atlas, des agences de voyage, etc...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta atividade os learners prepararão um 
folheto do curso sobre um país ou uma cidade que gostariam de 
visitar. Podem usar a informação encontrada no Internet ou em 
outras fontes tais como as ROM do CD, as enciclopédias, os atlases, 
as agências de curso, etc..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa attività principianti prepareranno un 
opuscolo di corsa su un paese o su una città che vorrebbero visitare.
Possono usare le informazioni trovate sul Internet o su altre 
sorgenti quali le ROM del CD, le enciclopedie, gli atlanti, le agenzie
di corsa, ecc.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την δραστηριότητα οι αρχάριοι θα 
προετοιμάσουν ένα φυλλάδιο ταξιδιού για μια χώρα ή μια πόλη που
θα επιθυμούσαν να επισκεφτούν. Μπορούν να χρησιμοποιήσουν 
τις πληροφορίες που βρίσκονται για το διαδίκτυο ή άλλες πηγές 
όπως τα CD-*ROM, οι εγκυκλοπαίδειες, οι άτλαντες, τα γραφεία 
ταξιδίων, κ.λπ....</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta actividad los principiantes prepararán 
un folleto del recorrido acerca de un país o de una ciudad que 
quisieran visitar. Pueden utilizar la información encontrada en
el Internet u otras fuentes tales como ROM del CD, enciclopedias, 
atlas, agencias de viajes, etc.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spielraumbroschüre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Land</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stadt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">brochure de voyage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ville</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">folheto do curso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">país</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta da lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">opuscolo di corsa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">paese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">città</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma di lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυλλάδιο ταξιδιού</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χώρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πόλη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">folleto del recorrido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">país</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ciudad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plan de la lección</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>
            <source>statusValues</source>
            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
version:3.0
fn:Israel Ministry of Education
n:Israel Ministry of Education
org:Israel Ministry of Education
end:vcard</entity>
            <date>
              <dateTime>2009-02-20</dateTime>
            </date>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1048</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
version:3.0
fn:Israel Ministry of Education
n:Israel Ministry of Education
org:Israel Ministry of Education
end:vcard</entity>
            <date>
              <dateTime>2009-02-20</dateTime>
            </date>
          </contribute>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>enquiry-oriented activity</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="en">14-18</string>
            <string language="x-t-lre">14-18</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>learner</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">=© 2003 Eric Cohen Books, Ltd. All rights reserved. http://www.ecb.co.il/ecbonline/termsofuse.html</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>1071</id>
              <entry>
                <string language="en">reading</string>
              </entry>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>926</id>
              <entry>
                <string language="en">oral</string>
              </entry>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>1410</id>
              <entry>
                <string language="en">writing skills</string>
              </entry>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>673</id>
              <entry>
                <string language="en">internet skills</string>
              </entry>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>157291</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.ecb.co.il/ecbonline/travel/brochureTG.html</uri>
      </location>

  </manifestation>
</expression>
